# Unicode.GeneralCategory.format

**Case**

A format control character.

## Declaration

```swift
case format
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Format` (abbreviated `Cf`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.format
